titleStmt.title: Cynthia VVith certaine sonnets, and the legend of Cassandra.
titleStmt.author: Barnfield, Richard, 1574-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humfrey Lownes, and are to bee sold at the vvest doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, the last line of the imprint reads: of Paules. 1595.
Bodleian Library copy identified as STC 1483 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
